meaning_str.bing:
n. 慈善；施舍；仁爱；赈济
网络. 博爱；慈善团体；慈善事业

博爱；慈善团体；慈善事业

慈善；慈善事业；慈善机构；慈善活动；施舍；援助；赈济；仁爱；宽容；宽厚；慈悲

1.en: One of my goals at the start of the year was to volunteer for a charity.
1.cn: 我们今年的目标之一就是为慈善机构当志愿者。

2.en: After all this event is all about riding bikes for charity in the support of people with intellectual disabilities.
2.cn: 毕竟此事件都是骑自行车为慈善事业在人民的支持与智力残疾。

3.en: On this day when Jupiter and Neptune meet, May 27, you may throw a major charity event, and if so, you would raise quite a bit of money.
3.cn: 5月27日，木星和海王星合相后，你会投身到一个主要的慈善活动中，如果这样的话，你会筹集到很多钱。

0.en: Why would a charity give away a free boat? I don't know. Charity? Well, just buy the damn boat.
0.cn: 慈善团体为什么要送帆船？我哪知，做慈善吗？你就买吧。

1.en: She has a charity event at 5:00, but they're not serving food.
1.cn: 她五点要参加一个慈善活动，但他们不管饭。

2.en: I don't race cars. I don't make popcorn. None of my proceeds go to charity.
2.cn: 我不会赛车或做爆米花，也不会捐钱给慈善团体。

3.en: No, I'm sorry, no. No, I'm not some like sloppy second, you know charity band.
3.cn: 对不起，不不，我可不是什么二流的慈善乐团。

4.en: Seriously, don't even give them to charity. You won't be helping anyone.
4.cn: 说真的，甚至不要把它们捐作慈善，你这不是在帮助任何人。

5.en: You're going to issue a statement saying that you're giving a million dollars to charity.
5.cn: 你要发表一项声明宣布将一百万美元捐作慈善。

6.en: No, but it's good. You know, I'm gonna take some time off and do charity work.
6.cn: 不，但那很好，你知道，我要休息一段时间做一些慈善工作。

7.en: Are you sure? We may have something at Louis Vuitton. Screw charity work. What do you got?
7.cn: 你肯定？我想我们现在需要人手。慈善工作，你们有什么?

8.en: Hey. Hey. Ross, listen can you come to a charity event tonight? Oh no, I have plans with Elizabeth.
8.cn: 罗斯，你晚上可以参加慈善晚会吗？不行，我跟伊丽莎白有约。

9.en: Okay, well, when you're done with your charity work, why don't you come find me? I'll be at Tory Burch looking at ponchos.
9.cn: 那好吧，你的慈善工作完毕之后过来找我？我去托利布奇那看看披风。

10.en: Two weeks ago, Wilkins left a lucrative job in the tech sector to found a new charity called O.T.P.S.
10.cn: 两周前，威尔金斯辞去了收入颇丰的技术职务，创建了一个慈善组织，名叫OTPS。

11.en: Yeah, right, the unemployed piano player who gave his trust fund to charity? I'm splitting the muffin with him.
11.cn: 是喔，那个把信托基金全捐给慈善机构的失业钢琴师吗？我要回去跟他分那个松饼的。

12.en: What were you thinking? I didn't know it was an auction. What? I figured, take a guess, help a charity, free boat.
12.cn: 你在想什么？我不知道这是拍卖会。什么？我以为是猜一猜帮助慈善团体，免费得帆船。

13.en: This is not charity. You have to have numbers. People are the best defense against walkers or people. We help each other.
13.cn: 我也不是做慈善的 人必须集体行动 人是对抗行尸的最好武器或者对抗其他人 我们互相帮助

14.en: Hey Rach. Are any of you guys free tonight? My boss is hosting this charity event for underprivileged kids and the more people I bring, the better I look. So, Monica? Chandler?
14.cn: 晚上有人有空吗？我老板要主持救助儿童慈善会，我带越多人去越有面子，莫妮卡？钱德？

15.en: I told my neighbor that I had, in fact, founded the charity and I thanked her for the money. But I will deny it if you ever bring that up. Okay.
15.cn: 我告诉我的邻居我确实，创立了这个慈善机构并感谢她的捐助。但如果你再提起这件事我不会承认的。好吧。

16.en: My son had gone house to house in the neighborhood for two weeks telling people that he was my son. And that he was raising money for a fictional police charity called Moms and Dads in Blue.
16.cn: 我的儿子真的两个星期挨家挨户的告诉邻居们他是我儿子。他正在筹款为一个虚构的名叫警察父母慈善机构。

17.en: Judith! Hello. I work for a bank, not a charity, and if your accounts are not settled by the end of the month...
17.cn: 朱迪思！你好。我是银行的雇员，不是慈善家，要是月底之前你还是拖欠不还的话……

18.en: Could you be less enthused? Look, it's a nice gesture. It is. But it just feels like... Like? Charity. Charity?
18.cn: 你们为何不高兴啊，各位。你们一番好意，可是我们觉得这像...像？施舍。施舍？

19.en: Well, You know what though you guys? I really appreciate that but I think I'm just gonna take Sebastian to the charity.
19.cn: 你们知道吗？真是谢谢你们，不过我带赛巴斯钦去就好了。
